website_summaries.verdict: The low drop at the back of this helmet is a good safety feature and offers a low, cut-away profile.
pros: Comes with the assortment of self-sticking foam inserts that allows you to custom fit the helmet to your head
Top and rear vents rate well for ventilation even in extreme heat
Comes in a wide range of colors and designs, all with a rear reflective strip
cons: doesn’t fit oval heads as well

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Tipperary
customer_reviews.text: Last week, my horse and I had a violent fall in a ditch, and then she crashed into a steel-railed pipe corral. Witnesses told me I hit it head first and slammed the back of my head again on the ground. Though I'm laid up for several weeks with bruising,a fractured leg, and a mild concussion, I realize things could have been so much worse had I not worn my Tipperary Sportage helmet. Bones heal, but brains, that's a different story. I am very grateful. Thank you, Tipperary!
customer_reviews.author: Trillium

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking helmet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for riding lessons. Very light and great fit, additional padding is supplied so you can get it just right. Air vents will be great in summer. Great looking helmet that would suit many equestrian disciplines.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this helmet! It is comfortable, it was a great price. I also liked how easy they directions were to follow in regards to adding more blocking to ensure a snug fit. This helmet is everything I was hoping it would be.
customer_reviews.author: skeenan

customer_reviews.title: I think it should at this price point but it is a very nice helmet and it is cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if it came with a built in helmet liner. I think it should at this price point but it is a very nice helmet and it is cool and comfortable. I bought the Troxel Helmet Headliner (Black, Large) to use with it and that works well for me as I needed a little extra padding in my helmet to fit so it worked out in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Nyneeve

customer_reviews.title: Tipperary Sportage Equestrian Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased a riding helmet other than a Troxel, which makes a fine helmet. However, this Tipperary helmet is awesome. It fits beautifully and is very comfortable no matter how hot it is in the park. I LOVE it and feel very protected when riding and wearing this Sportage Helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable & most protective helmet I've ever owned. Very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Helmet is light and comfortable. This is my second one
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Helmet is light and comfortable. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: CherylT

customer_reviews.title: She wearing it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter 16 ,wont wear the other brand of helmet she had.(troxel).really likes this helmet and wears it.She says it is very light weight on her head.Measured her head and order the size that she was and it was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: I really like it It is so light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A friend suggested this helmet. I really like it It is so light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Stoycoff

customer_reviews.title: Really well-made!
customer_reviews.text: This is low in the back so it protects the back of the head very well. The visor is very narrow and flexible so if you do a "face plant" your neck willl not be snapped from a large, stiff visor. The air circulation is very good and the color is understated and nice. I feel very comfortable having my one and only daughter wear this helmet. I would NOT recommend this if it was cheaply made, our riding children are too precious too skimp on their safety products.
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Tipperary
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Tipperary! It's the only helmet I've found that doesn't give me a headache when I ride. It's one of the safest and most comfortable helmets out there.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot before buying my helmet. I love how comfortably it fits and that it doesn't weigh that much at all. I also love the color and fit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stagman

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was tough Service was great
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit large. The sizing chart wasn't provided by the seller from what I could see. I searched elsewhere for the sizing and ended up with a very large helmet. Return went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: CrashingGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice helmet!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had tried one before and we knew which size to buy. Looks very nice and we liked the nice selection of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I won't ride in anything else. My last two helmets have been Tipperary. Been in a lot of accidents. The stiff visor even saved me from a busted nose once. Ready to order a new one as my las test has been in two accidents now. Very comfortable, in winter or summer. Many times I just leave it on its so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Reyvin Windwolf

customer_reviews.title: I was concussion free and other than bad bruising on my back
customer_reviews.text: On my first ride with my new helmet, I had the incident that reminds us why we wear helmets. I landed on the back of my head and the helmet fractured - by my head did not. I was concussion free and other than bad bruising on my back, I walked away. It's why we where these bad-boys, and I'm glad I bought the low profile helmet in the nick of time.
customer_reviews.author: BrownieMix

product_meta.title: Tipperary Sportage Equestrian Sport Helmet
product_meta.description: The Tipperary Sportage 8500 helmet is constructed of a lightweight high density ABS material that provides superior impact resistance. It has a contoured drop back shell and comfort foam interior to cradle the head, providing increased protection. It has functioning top and rear vents for high temperature relief. It also has a rear reflective strip and a flexible visor. ASTM-SEI certified (ASTM Standard F1163-04A).
